h2_title: Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides
content: Thankfully, with a limited range of attacks and a fairly straightforward way to avoid them, Jiao-Loong of Waves shouldn't require too much to take it down. Don't feel the need to conserve your spells during this fight; take advantage of them to quickly take down this miniboss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jiao-Loong_of_Waves.md', within the main section titled 'Jiao-Loong of Waves', specifically from the subsection 'Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides'.
The content is as follows:
Thankfully, with a limited range of attacks and a fairly straightforward way to avoid them, Jiao-Loong of Waves shouldn't require too much to take it down. Don't feel the need to conserve your spells during this fight; take advantage of them to quickly take down this miniboss.
